plot: A spanish worker obtains the Swiss nationality after twenty years living in Switzerland. He works in his own company and helps the inmigrants with problems. But after a laboral accident he comes back to Spain and changes radically his attitude.   Written by  Miguel A. Andrade
title: El techo del mundo
plot_es: A spanish worker obtains the Swiss nationality after twenty years living in Switzerland. He works in his own company and helps the inmigrants with problems. But after a laboral accident he comes back to Spain and changes radically his attitude.   Written by  Miguel A. Andrade
plot_en: A spanish worker obtains the Swiss nationality after twenty years living in Switzerland. He works in his own company and helps the inmigrants with problems. But after a laboral accident he comes back to Spain and changes radically his attitude.   Written by  Miguel A. Andrade
